sourcesContent:
import { Component, OnInit, ViewEncapsulation } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-experience', templateUrl: './experience.component.html', styleUrls: ['./experience.component.scss'], // encapsulation: ViewEncapsulation.None }) export class ExperienceComponent implements OnInit { constructor() { } ngOnInit(): void { } }

Experiences

UMYNO

Working Student - Data Analyst ( 11/2021 - Present, Frankfurt Am Main )

I have worked as Senior Data Analyst at Oracle from June 2018 till October 2020. My tasks and duties were as follows

  • Designed and developed server less applications using Oracle cloud applications for people to run their experiments faster.
  • Designed and developed applications to save efficiently use clusters, used to run Machine Leaning experiments , which resulted in saving millions of dollars.
  • Designed and developed Instrumentation frame work used by the Machine Leaning Platform Services Team, to track the progress and failures ahead of time.
  • Solved multiple high severity issues and improved the ticket queue by solving recurring issues by diving deep into the issue and coming up a solution, improving the overall project performance.
  • Gave multiple KT sessions to train existing and new team members.
  • Technologies used - Java, Dependency Injection Frameworks, Oracle Cloud.

I have worked as Software Developer 2 at Reliance Retail from May 2016 till June 2018. My tasks and duties were as follows

  • Writing RESTful Api.
  • Writing modular code for CI/CD development process.
  • Writing unit test cases.
  • Writing business, service and db layer modular codes to get, update and delete data.
  • Technologies used - Golang, Cassandra and Docker.

I have worked as Interactive developer L1 at Sapient Nitro from June 2014 till May 2016. My tasks and duties were as follows

  • Specialized developer in Front-End domain for several multi-million dollar clients.
  • Developed and tested responsive components with cross browser compatibility for client’s webpages.
  • Reduced the maintenance effort required by automation of CSS for all clients’s modules using GRUNT and LESS
  • Managed Front-End developers and Point of Contact for all front end development
  • Technologies used were HTML5, AJAX, Javascript, JQuery, Bootstrap, NodeJS, AngularJS, CSS3, LESS, Grunt
